name: LearnBlackHistory
0:
”Alexa, open learn black history”
”Alexa, start learn black history”
”Alexa, ask learn black history for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learn black history
des:
Welcome to Learn Black History. This will be an ever-evolving and updating skill and knowledge resource, to give users and unlimited amount of Black History. From sports to space, we will strive to leave no stone unturned on our quest for knowledge, and the quest to educated the normal everyday Alexa user. Thank you for taking the time to read this, add this skill to your library and enjoy the information.

Ask Alexa for an interesting list of facts about your topic of choice. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
